name: Fire-Watch
description: Realtime tracking and analysis of IOT devices, with realtime notifications using Django Channels and web socket APIs.

name: Frappe
description: Low code web framework for real world applications, in Python and Javascript.

name: Bench

name: Trogon
description: The lean application framework for Python. Build sophisticated user interfaces with a simple Python API. Run your apps in the terminal and a web browser.

name: GithubSRM
description: Platform for open source project management and open source project automation.
